resources.string: No! Please follow the installation instructions for the app to work.

In order for this app to work, a special system permission, WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS, needs to be granted to this app via adb.

To do so, connect your phone to adb and type the following command into your terminal:

adb shell pm grant in.iamkelv.immersify android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

Restart this app and the permissions should be granted.

Immersify comes with a notification which you can press to toggle immersive mode. Additionally, if you are on Android 7.0 (Nougat) or higher, Immersify also has a tile which can also be used to achieve this.
